title: Button
description: SHARE THE LOVE OF READING WITH YOUR BEGINNER READER! AGES 4-7 “AROOOOF! AROOOOF!”Button is an adorable little golden puppy who has one word to learn—WOOF! And the best teacher around is this little first grader, Buffy. She knows all about this cute dog—his favorite color is red and that his most fun subject in ‘doggie’ home school is math! Will he ever learn WOOF instead of AROOOOOF! “Button, let’s have some fun—do you want to count R-E-D buttons?” What did he learn?
author: Joyce  Mitchell
